item.key: ###Fill in detail for scuba equipment rental###
item.val: 填写资料以便准备租用的装备
填写资料以便准备装备

I agree and understand the cancellation policy set by Marine House SEASIR on the official English website link Marine House SEASIR Cancellation PolicyIf I cancelled on activity day, the cancellation charge will be 100% of full charge.
I will receive a PayPal deposit request from SEASIR LTD. account, to secure your booking please make your deposit of JPY

per person within 3 days start from the day I receive deposit request from our PayPal account, or within 24 hours if the booking request is less than 3 days notice from the departure date. All booking request will cancel if no deposit receive.
I will have more than 18 hours resting hour after the activity: Leisure Diving, Introductory Diving, Marine Walk before my flight.

I’ve READ and AGREED booking policy as below: I agree and understand the cancellation policy set by Marine House SEASIR on the official English website link Marine House SEASIR Cancellation Policy. If I cancelled on activity day, the cancellation charge will be 100% of full charge. I will have more than 18 hours resting hour from the activity: Leisure Diving, Introductory Diving, Marine Walk before my flight. I will receive a PayPal deposit request from SEASIR LTD. account, to secure your booking please make your deposit of JPY5,000 per person within 3 days start from the day I receive deposit request from our PayPal account, or within 24 hours if the booking request is less than 3 days notice from the departure date. All booking request will cancel if no deposit received. I affirm that after checking Marine House SEASIR Health Check List none of us have any question in the Health Check List that answers apply YES to any one of us. I and we agree to accept responsibility for omissions regarding our failure to disclose any existing or past health condition.
